channel.title: How do I set where your armor goes....PLEASE READ
channel.description: OKay I spawned a bone sack, but it goes to wear my weapon is supposed to be....It doesn't go where the cape. Or the Harpie Bug lantern goes to my shield spot and not my weapon spot..How do I change this?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 27, 2007, 09:23:46 AM[/size][hr]anyone??

item.title: How do I set where your armor goes....PLEASE READ
